1.name: Pedro Space
1.about: This website you are looking at. It was made to learn a little about JS and react. While building this website, I realized that front end development is not as boring as I thought it would be. The back-end was built using django and its rest framework in order for me to understand how different front and back end technologies communicate with each other.

2.name: Mark 2.0
2.about: A virtual assistant inspired by J.A.R.V.I.S from Iron Man. Made in python and connected the assistant with the OpenAI API, so it can do anything chat GPT is capable of. The assistant has speech recognition and text to speech functions as well. Mark 1.0 was made before chat GPT; it was connected with WolframAlpha API and was able to answer simple logical questions.

3.name: Hand Gestures
3.about: This project was made to learn a little about computer vision. Hand Gestres is a program that recognizes human hands and triggers actions depending on the fingers' positions.

4.name: Apolo
4.about: Apolo is a discord music bot. The bot was made to play music from Youtube links. I created it because other existing Youtube music bots were stopping to work and I wanted a working bot to use with my friends. It is not working anymore; the method I used to get Youtube songs was shut down
